statements: UPDATE bookings SET total_cost = 1000.50, status = 'paid' WHERE booking_id = 1;
UPDATE bookings SET booking_date = '2022-08-15', booking_time = '15:30' WHERE booking_id = 2;
UPDATE bookings SET status = 'cancelled', total_cost = total_cost - 50.00 WHERE booking_id = 101
UPDATE bookings SET booking_date = '2022-10-15', total_cost = total_cost + 25.00 WHERE booking_type = 'Flight'
UPDATE flights SET airline = 'Delta Airlines' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE bookings SET booking_reference = 'ABC123' WHERE booking_type = 'online';
UPDATE flights SET airline='Airline A', departure_date='2023-07-15 10:00:00' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE bookings SET booking_date='2023-08-20 14:30:00', booking_type='Business' WHERE booking_reference='ABCD1234';
UPDATE flights SET destination='London', departure_date='2022-08-15', arrival_date='2022-08-16' WHERE flight_id=1020;
UPDATE hotels SET price=200.50, location='Downtown', hotel_name='Sheraton' WHERE hotel_id=2001;
UPDATE flights SET departure_date='2022-09-15', arrival_date='2022-09-16', destination='Paris' WHERE flight_id=101;
UPDATE hotels SET price=250.50, location='Downtown', hotel_name='Grand Hotel' WHERE hotel_id=201;

UPDATE hotels SET price = 150.00, room_type = 'Standard' WHERE hotel_id = 201
UPDATE flights SET departure_airport='JFK', arrival_airport='LAX' WHERE flight_id=12345;
UPDATE hotels SET room_type='Suite', price=1500.00 WHERE hotel_id=54321;

UPDATE Hotels SET price = 150.00, rating = 4 WHERE hotel_name = 'Marriott';
